                                    <div class="tin-cell-text" placeholder="{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;tin_cell_text_watch_anywhere&quot;,&quot;active&quot;:false}"><span class="text-full">Watch anywhere</span><span class="text-short">Devices</span></div>

    <script src="https://codex.nflxext.com/%5E2.0.0/truthBundle/webui/0.0.1-nmhp-js-1c8ae6bf/js/js/signup%7Chome%7Clite%7Cclient.js/1/7523/l/true/none"></script>
    <div>
        <script type="text/javascript">
            (function() {
                try {

                    try {
                        //create a new XHR request
                        var xhrRequest = new XMLHttpRequest();
                        var startTime;
                        var endTime;

                        function onStateChange() {
                            //called when the XHR request object updates  status
                            if (xhrRequest.readyState === XMLHttpRequest.DONE) {
                                //after its done, mark the time
                                endTime = encodeURIComponent(Date.now());

                                var statusCode = xhrRequest.status;

                                //assemble a logging url with the things we're interested in
                                var url = '/ichnaea/cl2/freeform/DebugEvent?source=www&action=jsSimplicityPrefetch&statusCode=' + statusCode + '&startTime=' + startTime + '&endTime=' + endTime;

                                //create an img
                                var img = document.createElement('img');
                                img.src = url;
                                // making sure the images are hidden, otherwise they add a small white bar at the bottom of our NMHP
                                img.setAttribute('style', 'display: none');
                                //append it to <body>, thereby making a request and logging.
                                document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].appendChild(img);
                            }
                        }

                        //record the timestamp when we open the request
                        startTime = encodeURIComponent(Date.now());

                        //open the request for the resource
                        xhrRequest.open('GET', 'https://codex.nflxext.com/%5E2.0.0/truthBundle/webui/0.0.1-shakti-js-1c8ae6bf/js/js/signup%7Csimplicity%7CsimpleSignupClient.js/2/4Lgy0ogqg3g14Bg50B0t4vgagx0s0P01gzg9gcg60ygogl4Fgbf-ge4H4G1u0ngmgt/l/true/none', true);

                        xhrRequest.onreadystatechange = onStateChange;

                        //fire!
                        xhrRequest.send();
                    } catch (e) {
                        //do nothing
                    }

                } catch (ex) {
                    //do nothing
                }
            })();
        </script>
        <script type="text/javascript">
            (function() {
                try {

                    try {
                        //create a new XHR request
                        var xhrRequest = new XMLHttpRequest();
                        var startTime;
                        var endTime;

                        function onStateChange() {
                            //called when the XHR request object updates  status
                            if (xhrRequest.readyState === XMLHttpRequest.DONE) {
                                //after its done, mark the time
                                endTime = encodeURIComponent(Date.now());

                                var statusCode = xhrRequest.status;

                                //assemble a logging url with the things we're interested in
                                var url = '/ichnaea/cl2/freeform/DebugEvent?source=www&action=cssSimplicityPrefetch&statusCode=' + statusCode + '&startTime=' + startTime + '&endTime=' + endTime;

                                //create an img
                                var img = document.createElement('img');
                                img.src = url;
                                // making sure the images are hidden, otherwise they add a small white bar at the bottom of our NMHP
                                img.setAttribute('style', 'display: none');
                                //append it to <body>, thereby making a request and logging.
                                document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].appendChild(img);
                            }
                        }

                        //record the timestamp when we open the request
                        startTime = encodeURIComponent(Date.now());

                        //open the request for the resource
                        xhrRequest.open('GET', 'https://codex.nflxext.com/%5E2.0.0/truthBundle/webui/0.0.1-shakti-css-1c8ae6bf/css/css/less%7Cpages%7Csignup%7Csimplicity%7Csimplicity.less/2/0A0O050I0a0H0S0V0P0J0N0U0Z/none/true/none', true);

                        xhrRequest.onreadystatechange = onStateChange;

                        //fire!
                        xhrRequest.send();
                    } catch (e) {
                        //do nothing
                    }

                } catch (ex) {
                    //do nothing
                }
            })();
        </script>
